summary: Add random bandit encounters in the wild for Requiem 1.7.x and 1.8.x
descriptionHtml:
This mod will add random unleveled bandit encounters in the wild for Requiem 1.7.x and 1.8.x. There are no scripts in this mod.

[u]Version 2.0[/u]
Bandit patrols of 3-4 bandits have been added going between two nearby bandit camps. Patrols have been placed to avoid killing innocent NPCs and to avoid the complete wipe of the patrol itself by aggressive NPCs.


[u][u]Compatibility[/u]:
[/u]Requiem 1.7.x to 1.8.x

[i]**This mod is compatible with vanilla Skyrim, OBIS, PerMa, etc.. Load Requiem Bandit Encounters.esp after those mods the load order for random unleveled bandit encounters in the wild**[/i]
[u]

Installation:[/u]
Use NMM, MO, or just extract Requiem Bandit Encounters.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.

[u]Load order:[/u]
Use LOOT or place Requiem Bandit Encounters.esp after Requiem and before Requiem for the Indifferent (Requiem 1.8.x).

Skyrim.esm
....
....
....
....
Requiem.esp
....
Requiem Bandit Encounters.esp
....
Bashed Patch, 0.esp                    <--- if you use Wrye Bash
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp


[u]Credits/Thanks:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]: Ogerboss and Xarrian
author: spikyfishy
